text:
e="preserve">The Azerbaijan national basketball team () is the national basketball team of Azerbaijan. The team is controlled by the Azerbaijan Basketball Federation.
Azerbaijan has been a FIBA member since 1991, although they have not fielded a senior national team in any competition in over five years.
Current roster.
At the 2013 EuroBasket Qualification: "(last publicized squad)"
Past rosters.
Coach: Samit Nuruzade
